page.title: 06HOUSING
page.content: The residential buildings have been created on either side of what was the main trunk road. Within the area there is a mixture of both private and council houses both of which have been present for many years. Over the past few years there have been a few additions to the private sector with people building their own houses in what ever space is available. In another part of the town, (ABERAVON) there is a vast council estate called SANDFIELDS ESTATE that was built to take the overflow of people coming into the area with the increase in industrial activity. Throughout the borough council tennants have been given the option of buying their houses. Many have taken up this option.
